name: Important Links Widget
author: D'Arcy Norman

sections.description:
Adds a simple widget that contains important links for use on a community blogging site – new post, new page, login, logout, etc…

Basic Usage

Install and enable plugin. Add the widget wherever you want it via Appearance: Widgets. That is all.
sections.installation: Installing the plugin is as easy as unzipping and uploading the entire important-links-widget folder into your /wp-content/plugins directory and activating the plugin. It can be activated on individual sites, or an all sites under WPMU.
sections.faq:
